Come and Join Us

Present your latest and greatest work at IEEE VR 2022. This will be the first time that IEEE VR is held not only in Australasia but in the entire Southern Hemisphere. IEEE VR 2022 will be held in Christchurch, one of the main centres in New Zealand and the largest city of and gateway to New Zealand's South Island. The New York Times named Christchurch one of 52 places to visit in 2020 as it stands out as a global symbol of resilience. In recent years it has been completely redeveloped, resulting in the construction of Te Pae, the new conference centre where we will hold the conference from 12th-16th March 2022.

We are actively monitoring the COVID-19 situation to determine if the in-person IEEE VR experience will be both safe and feasible due to internation travel restrictions. We expect that these restrictions will permit you to join the conference in person. In addition to this, the conference will be a hybrid event. Our goal is for IEEE VR 2022 to provide the best experience for both in-person and virtual attendees, following in the historical footsteps of the Virtual Experience of the Virtual Experience of VR 2020 in Atlanta and VR 2021 in Lisbon. Come join us for an unforgettable experience and explore the virtuality continuum in the premier event covering extended reality featuring oral presentations, posters, research demos, tutorials, and workshops.
